description: Common succulent plant with thick, fleshy leaves containing a clear gel. Widely used in topical and oral remedies.
Dainty flowering herb with daisy-like blooms. Its dried flowers are commonly brewed into tea with calming properties.
Tall flowering herb with purple daisy-like flowers. Used traditionally to bolster the immune system and fight off colds and flu.
Spiced root with a pungent aroma and flavor. Used in various remedies for pain, nausea, and digestive issues.
Fragrant herb with purple flowers. Used in aromatherapy and topical remedies for relaxation, pain relief, and skin care.
Lemon-scented herb with small white flowers. Used in tea and topical remedies for relaxation, indigestion relief, and cold sore treatment.
Stinging herb with serrated leaves. Used in tea and topical remedies for allergies, inflammation, and skin and hair health.
Aromatic herb with menthol-flavored leaves. Used in tea, tinctures, and topical remedies for digestive issues, headaches, and oral care.
Vibrant yellow root with a warm, earthy flavor. Used in cooking and supplements for its anti-inflammatory and health-promoting properties.
Pungent bulb with papery skin and numerous cloves. Used in cooking and supplements for its immune-boosting and health-protective properties.
Small shrub with yellow flowers and red berries. Used in supplements for stress relief, energy enhancement, and overall health support.
Common bright yellow wildflower with dandelion-shaped flowers and fluffy seeds. Used in tea and tinctures for liver health, detoxification, and digestive support.
Shrub or small tree with white flowers and red berries. Used in tea and supplements for heart health, blood pressure regulation, and anxiety relief.
Tall grass with green leafy blades and oat panicles. Used in tea and tinctures for stress relief, sleep improvement, and nervous system support.
Palm-like plant with fan-shaped leaves and small berries. Used in supplements for prostate health, urinary tract support, and potentially hair loss and libido concerns.
Flowering herb with pink or white flowers and a strong odor. Used in tea and supplements for relaxation, sleep improvement, and anxiety relief.
